caseTitle: Rehm Dad v. Province of Punjab through its Chief Secretary, Lahore and others
tagline: (i) Maintainability of the Intra-Court Appeal (ii) Interpretation of proviso to Section 3(2) of the Law Reforms Ordinance, 1972 (iii) Meaning of the phrase law applicable in Section 3(2) of the LRO (iv) Scope of Sections 18 and 54 of the Land Acquisition Act, 1894.
